resources.string: To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
With GalleME You can present your friends with your personal gallery!
Please make sure Google speech-to-text is installed here:
Please grant the permissions to access your gallery and microphone on the next screen. GalleME will be unable to function properly without doing so
You\'re all done setting up! \nIf you\'ve granted the required permissions, the \"GOT IT\" button will be available to start enjoying GalleME!
Here will be shown all keywords currently displayed
